metadata.description: Test parental leave policy query against FantaCo HR Benefits document

messages.content: What is the parental leave policy?
messages.expected_output: The FantaCo HR Benefits document does not contain specific information about a parental leave policy. The document covers other time-off benefits through their "Never-Ending Story of Glorious Time Off" Vacation Policy, which provides 365 "Adventure Units" per year that could potentially be used for parental leave purposes, but no dedicated parental leave policy is described.
